mapper.select: select count(1) from orders o left JOIN users u on o.user_id = u.id where u.vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.type_id = #{typeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and o.completed = '1'

select u.vin, o.type_id, t.name,o.use_car_type,o.use_time,o.begin_time,o.address,o.destination,o.rent_city,o.dealer_addr from orders o left join users u on o.user_id = u.id left join types t on o.type_id = t.type where u.vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.type_id = #{typeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and o.completed = '1'

select o.use_time,o.end_time, sum(case when u.car_type='2017款GL8' then 1 else 0 end) as seven_gl, sum(case when u.car_type='2018款君越' then 1 else 0 end) as eight_jy, sum(case when u.car_type='2018款GL8' then 1 else 0 end) as eight_gl, sum(case when u.car_type='2019款GL8' then 1 else 0 end) as nine_gl, sum(case when u.car_type='2019款君越' then 1 else 0 end) as nine_jy from orders o left join users u on o.user_id = u.id where o.completed = 1 and type_id = #{typeId} and car_type is not null
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.use_time, '%Y') ORDER BY o.use_time ASC
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.end_time, '%Y') ORDER BY o.end_time ASC
